name: SPACE MOONSHINER (itch)
description:
2D Strategy, economic, management, trade, fight & Explore!
Build your own base... 
Equip it with appropriate machines, warehouses and tanks. 
Go looking for deposits and mine them. Hunt local life forms, 
collect their skins, harvest fruit and make moonshine from them.
Trade with cosmic corporations and with natives... 
Or fight with them! 
Discover other planets and enjoy their difference!
Be surprised by the wealth of possibilities!
